question.title: Concatenated Strings in cell produce extra space in iText
question.body:
Concatenated string produces extra whitespace between words.

String cellLine = new StringBuilder()  
    .append("*********")
    .append("World")
    .append("***********")
    .toString();

Cell cell1 = new Cell(1, 3)
    .add(cellLine)
    .setTextAlignment(TextAlignment.CENTER)
    .setBold();

table.addCell(cell1);

Actual Output is

********* World<    space    >***********

Expected Output

******************* World****************

Could someone please help as to how to get rid of this unwanted space in the actual output

Tried using StringBuilder to avoid spaces in the string when it is built. But it doesn't help.
